name: OPUMO
description:
Joining the OPUMO community lets you:

- Connect with influencers, designers & people you know.
- Shop the latest fashion & lifestyle direct from hundreds of designers.
- Personalise your feed for a unique shopping experience.
- Create bespoke wishlists to showcase your style.
- Earn rewards for influencing others on the platform.

jobs.title: Data Analyst Internship
jobs.description:
How can you expect to spend your day? 

You will join the business as a Data Analyst Intern to identify and analyse customer behaviour and website data to help make data driven decisions which shape the company’s marketing and product development strategy. This is an interesting position within the company as your analysis will identify new business opportunities through website changes, develop new marketing campaigns and help grow this fast-paced start-up business.  
Tasks you can expect to learn about and undertake include: 

•    The focus of this job is data extraction, aggregation and analysis of multiple data sources to give actionable insights of how the business and its customers operate. 
•    Create monthly reports and dashboards to aid decisions for change and identify opportunities.
•    Analyse site optimisations to prove value and suggest future changes. 
•    Analyse marketing activities and find opportunities for improvements. 
•    Support the team with data analysis when investigating new opportunities. 
•    Help with customer segmentation to aid marketing activity. 
•    Regularly check the integrity of data and track this for accuracy. 

What are the ideal intern’s skills, personality and qualifications? 
•    Educated to degree level, maths or science based subjects are preferred. 
•    A clear, concise and confident communicator. 
•    A positive and energetic approach to work. 
•    Strong Excel skills. 
•    A numerate person comfortable working with and analysing data. 
•    A team player with the ability to think on their feet and not be phased or put-out by fast moving situations. 
•    Someone interested to learn what makes a business grow, with good business acumen and someone who sees themselves one day starting their own company. 
•    Someone interested to learn what makes a business grow, with good business acumen and someone who sees themselves one day starting their own company. 
•    Prior experience working with Google Analytics is a bonus but not a pre-requisite. 
•    Prior experience using a CRM tool such as Ometria is a bonus but not a pre-requisite.

jobs.title: Merchandising Intern
jobs.description:
How can you expect to spend your day?

We’re looking for a merchandising intern who is passionate about design and curation and someone who wants to work in a fun and fast growing ecommerce environment. 

Tasks you can expect to undertake include: 

•	Optimise product information to increase conversion and product performance
•	Support the wider curation and creative team in our growing community of design led brands ensuring that new products are created and curated inline with OPUMO’s guidelines and tastelevels. 
•	Perform site walks regularly to ensure products are listed correctly and consistently. 
•	Work confidently across wider teams and support daily merchandising activities. 

What are the intern’s skills, personality and qualifications? 

•	Educated to degree level, maths or science based subjects are preferred.
•	 A clear, concise and confident communicator. 
•	 A positive and energetic approach to work. 
•	Top notch organisational skills and naturally structured approach to your thinking. 
•	Natural curiosity and an inquisitive streak 
•	Sound data analysis skills 
•	High taste level and strong appreciation for all things design. 
•	Knowledge of interior and fashion trends 
•	A passion for OPUMO and what we stand for!
